Subject: Invitation to Discuss Carbon Pricing on "Green Futures" Podcast

Hi Dr. Patel,

I’m Alex Rivera, host of the "Green Futures" podcast where we explore cutting‑edge ideas shaping a sustainable world. Our listeners have shown strong interest in climate policy and sustainable investing – topics we’ve covered in recent episodes on renewable‑energy financing and carbon markets.

Given your pioneering work on carbon pricing mechanisms and your recent publication on international climate agreements, I believe you would be an incredible guest for our upcoming episode titled “The Future of Carbon Pricing: From Theory to Global Action.”

We would love to hear your insights on how carbon pricing can be effectively implemented worldwide, the challenges policymakers face, and what the next decade might hold for climate finance.

The interview typically runs 45‑60 minutes and can be scheduled at your convenience via our online calendar. Please let me know if you’re interested, and I’ll gladly provide more details.

Thank you for considering the invitation. I look forward to the possibility of featuring your expertise on "Green Futures."

Best regards,
Alex Rivera
Host, Green Futures Podcast
alex.rivera@greenfuturespod.com
